name: autollama-database
description: Database tools and schema for AutoLlama

scripts.test-connection: node -e "console.log('Testing PostgreSQL connection...'); const { Client } = require('pg'); const client = new Client({ host: 'localhost', port: 5432, database: 'autollama', user: 'autollama_user', password: 'autollama_secure_password_2024' }); client.connect().then(() => { console.log('✅ PostgreSQL connection successful'); client.end(); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ PostgreSQL connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"

author: AutoLlama
